title: Man and 16-year-old hospitalized after shooting in Orosi
content:
FRESNO, Calif. (KFSN) --
Two people remained hospitalized Saturday following a shooting in Orosi.
The shooting happened just after midnight on David Road near Road 124. When officers arrived, they found a 22-year-old man and a 16-year-old suffering from gunshot wounds.
Both were transported to the hospital in stable condition and are expected to survive.
Officers are now trying to determine what led up to the shooting while putting together a description of the suspects.
